argument.description: Numeric value used in the calculation.
Numeric value used in the calculation.

returnType: The MOD function returns a numeric value. The MOD function returns m if n is 0.
description: The Oracle/PLSQL MOD function returns the remainder of m divided by n.
sample:
MOD(15, 4)
Result: 3

MOD(15, 0)
Result: 15

MOD(11.6, 2)
Result: 1.6

MOD(11.6, 2.1)
Result: 1.1

MOD(-15, 4)
Result: -3

MOD(-15, 0)
Result: -15
